# Naia OS

> The most advanced AI agent, as the perfect OS.

Naia OS Homepage (naia.nextain.io) is the official service portal and documentation hub for Naia OS, a personal AI desktop operating system.

## What is Naia OS?

Naia OS is a desktop application (and a standalone Linux OS) featuring:
- **3D AI Avatar**: A fully animated 3D character named Naia that lives on your desktop.
- **Voice Conversations**: Real-time voice chat with AI using text-to-speech and speech-to-text.
- **Multi-LLM Support**: Connect to Google Gemini, Anthropic Claude, xAI Grok, and more under a single account.
- **Agent System**: AI agents that can browse the web, manage files, and execute terminal commands autonomously.
- **Tool Execution**: Deep integration with your local OS, allowing the AI to actually perform tasks for you.

## What does this portal provide?

The homepage and portal (this site) provides:
- **Account Management**: OAuth sign-in via Google and Discord.
- **API Credit System**: Manage credits for LLM API usage.
- **Usage Dashboard**: Monitor your AI usage, request logs, and token consumption.
- **API Key Management**: Create and manage API keys for connecting the desktop app.
- **Desktop Integration**: Seamless deep-link connection between the web portal and the local Naia OS app.
- **User Manuals**: Comprehensive guides on installing and using Naia OS.

## Public Pages

- `/en` or `/ko` — Homepage (features, pricing, FAQ)
- `/en/manual` or `/ko/manual` — User manual
- `/en/terms` — Terms of Service
- `/en/privacy` — Privacy Policy
- `/en/refund` — Refund Policy
- `/en/contact` — Contact

## Technology

- Built with Next.js (App Router), deployed on Vercel
- Frontend: Tailwind CSS 4, shadcn/ui, lucide-react
- Backend: Next.js API Routes proxying to a FastAPI any-llm gateway
- Desktop app: Tauri 2 + React + Node.js agent (OpenClaw compatible)
- Languages: English and Korean (i18n)

## Company

Naia OS is developed by Nextain, a South Korean AI company.
- Website: https://naia.nextain.io
- GitHub: https://github.com/nextain/naia-os
- Discord: https://discord.gg/FGYJN7auty
